title: [AWS] Overview
content: Description : This note is for noting some concepts of aws services. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Serverless Pay for our consuming time of that services 1. S3 S3 is a storage that offer a virtual storage for unlimited capacity It have bucket and object Bucket : It is a directory Object : It is a file inside a directory 2. Lambda : Services that for handling deploying servicesSupport multiple language 3. Dynamo DB :A database services Scalability 4. Api gateway : Make for create, publish and maintain API. Serve as an entry point for other services such as aws services ***Pipeline : * Threat modeling : Understand potential of threat Detect early Easy to understand visualy * Question for Threating : What are we working on What can go wrong What are we doing about this Did we do good job ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Event-Driven Architectures .State and code are decouple .Integration via messages .Anync connection Using for : .Decoupling the user experience and running code .Providing reduced latency on HTTP responses .Reducing the potential for timeouts or deadlocks EX : [Event source] ==> [Lambda function] ==> [Service] *Event source : Amazon SQS, Amazon SNS, Amazon Kinesis, api gateway *Service : Amazon DynamoDB *Amazon SQS* : Support standard and FIFO Standard : */ Order is not guaranteed */ Messages may be delivered more than once */ Nearly unlimited messages per second FIFO : */ Order is guaranteed per group ID */ Messages are delivered only once. There are no duplicate messages introduced to the queue */ FIFO queues support up to 300 messages per second, per API action without batching, or 3,000 with batching Amazon SQS integration with Lambda : [API GATEWAY] => [SQS Queue] => [Lambda services] [SQS queue pool] ==> Lambda services (FIFO queue) | Size batch : 03 ( Ex ) | ==> Lambda services process 3 batch * Success : => Response through the queue * Fail case : => Visible again in the queue pool for reprocess * Fail case retry reach : => Coming to Dead letter queue **Problems have to deal with lambda function** */ Error and retry process */ Must have rollback logic
